text:
Echo has the capability of appending message to file.  Why not in the Exec 
task?  I have made an enhanced version for myself and I thought I would share 
the idea with everyone.

Disregards if this has planned in the later version of 1.3
creator: snguyen@irislabs.com

text:
Please supply the patch that you have created.  Meanwhile, a workaround is to
use outputproperty to capture the output of exec into a property and then
use echo to append this property's value to the output file.
creator: umagesh@apache.org
